name: ansible-setup-owncloud
description: Automate the installation of OwnCloud on RancherOS
author: Ajay Ganapathy <lets.talk@designbyajay.com>

scripts.getDigitalOceanAPISpec: stat utils/get-digitalocean-api/index.js && node utils/get-digitalocean-api/index.js || $( yarn generateDigitalOceanAPISpec && yarn getDigitalOceanAPISpec )
scripts.generateDigitalOceanAPISpec: yarn install && cd utils/get-digitalocean-api/ && npx webpack --mode=production
